enhanced_by.reason: Both methods interact with the hConstants map, making it useful to set up the state before invoking addConstant.
Both methods involve setting up a state (constants in this case) that can be reused in other methods.
process() method sets the FastHashMap to 'fast' mode, which might be necessary before adding constants.
Environment setup might be required before adding constants, especially if the environment affects the behavior of the addConstant method.
